name: supercluster
description: A crazy fast geospatial point clustering library.

scripts.build-dev: mkdirp dist && browserify -d index.js -s supercluster > dist/supercluster.js
scripts.build-min: mkdirp dist && browserify index.js -s supercluster | uglifyjs -c warnings=false -m > dist/supercluster.min.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run build-dev && npm run build-min

author: Vladimir Agafonkin
